description:
Dakki has been houshined, but her soul flies off to Mount Kunlun instead of the Houshin Platform. What is going on here? It seems that Genshitenson is hiding something, and Taikoubou and crew go to Mount Kunlun to ascertain the  truth. However, they will have to get through Mount Kunlun`s defenses first.
Source: crunchyroll
